Add Tap the plus button to add to the count
Subtract Tap the minus button to subtract from the count
Reset Tap the circular arrow to reset the count to zero
Additional Options Long pressing the count number gives you a few additional options:\n-Change Count: Allows you to manually enter a new count\n-Increase/Decrease By: Allows you to enter a number to be added to or subtracted from the count
Counter Menu Long pressing a counter will open a menu with additional options for it
Re-Organizing Counters The arrows in the top corners of each counter allow you to re-arrange the order of the counters to your liking
Changing Views You can choose between two viewing options in the multicounter:\n-Full View: Bigger, more detailed, but fits less counters onto the screen\n-Condensed View: Smaller, less detailed, but fits more counters onto the screen
Multicounter Menu You can long press a multicounter to rename, delete, or view more details about it
Multicounter Search Tapping the search icon at the top of the screen will allow you to quickly search for a multicounter
